title: Shaco needs fixing
body:
Many experienced Shaco players would trick the enemy into thinking that he went straight, but in reality he goes the opposite direction. The issue is, if Shaco does decide to jump on top of a player ( to escape/juke), -** if the auto attack option is on**, then he will be **revealed** after ** even 1 frame of auto attack**. A suggestion to fix this would be obviously, to not reveal until the full auto attack animation has played. *Turning off auto attack is an option, but I like keeping auto attack on, as I can continue to jungle, while looking around the map.*

In addition to this, though I already know Shaco is superior in the jungle when it comes to ganks, there should be some consideration between making it harder to tell the clones apart. In lower elos, the issues are **buffs **(red, blue, baron), in higher elos, the issue is **stat difference**. The clones should only be departed by **damage dealt**, (where aoe damage is a counter).

Improvements on clone AI after Shaco dying would be good too.

Thank you :)
